thread.title: UK lab could be source of toxin used on former spy - Russian diplomat

title: UK lab could be source of toxin used on former spy - Russian diplomat
text:
UK lab could be source of toxin used on former spy - Russian diplomat 5:47pm GMT - 00:43 
A UK laboratory could be the source of the nerve agent used on a former Russian double agent in the English city of Salisbury, Russia's EU ambassador suggested in an interview aired on BBC's Andrew Marr on Sunday. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
A UK laboratory could be the source of the nerve agent used on a former Russian double agent in the English city of Salisbury, Russia's EU ambassador suggested in an interview aired on BBC's Andrew Marr on Sunday.
